title: Fabula
content: anyone who hasn't already seen this at typographi.ca should check it out, from dec. 2. if you want something for kids forget comic sans, try this. it's a pretty interesting concept, and it doesn't look like some knucklehead in detention scrawled it with a sharpie. anyway, check it out. [typographi.ca](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019061154/http:/www.typographi.ca/)
author: Isaac
